General.Name: NEOWIZ HOLDINGS Corporation
General.Description: NEOWIZ HOLDINGS Corporation develops and publishes online games. It is also involved in software production, game software, real estate management, medical supplies, online music, and advisory supply businesses; and provision of graphic outsourcing, and management consulting and advisory services. The company was formerly known as Neowiz Corporation and changed its name to NEOWIZ HOLDINGS Corporation in March 2013. NEOWIZ HOLDINGS Corporation was founded in 1997 and is based in Seongnam-si, South Korea.
General.Address: NEOWIZ PANGYO TOWER, Seongnam-si, South Korea, 13487
